posts.title: MathJax公式
posts.text: [TOC] 摘取自：在Hexo中渲染MathJax数学公式 MathJax公式公式书写依然按照MarkDown语法来，基本上也和LaTeX相同，单$符引住的是行内公式，双$符引住的是行间公式。 MathJax公式书写参考http://meta.math.stackexchange.com/questions/5020/mathjax-basic-tutorial-and-quick-reference 行内公式含下划线_的公式: $x_mu$ 1$x_mu$ 希腊字符: $\sigma$ 1$\sigma$ 行内公式: $y=ax+b$ 1$y=ax+b$ 行内公式: $\cos 2\theta = \cos^2 \theta - \sin^2 \theta = 2 \cos^2 \theta$ 1$\cos 2\theta = \cos^2 \theta - \sin^2 \theta = 2 \cos^2 \theta$ 行内公式: $M(\beta^{\ast}(D),D) \subseteq C$ 1$M(\beta^{\ast}(D),D) \subseteq C$ 行间公式1$$ \sum_{i=0}^n i^2 = \frac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6} $$ \sum_{i=0}^n i^2 = \frac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6}1$$ x = \dfrac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} $$ x = \dfrac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}大括号右多行赋值双\\公式内换行，cases实现大括号右多行赋值，&用来对齐: 1234567$$f(n) =\begin{cases}n/2, & \text{if $n$ is even} \\3n+1, & \text{if $n$ is odd}\end{cases}$$ f(n) = \begin{cases} n/2, & \text{if $n$ is even} \\ 3n+1, & \text{if $n$ is odd} \end{cases}多行公式对齐比如多行公式推导中常用的等号对齐begin{split} 表示开始多行公式，end{split}表示结束；公式中用\\表示回车到下一行，&表示对齐的位置。 12345678910$$\begin{equation}\begin{split}\frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial{x^2}} &= \frac{\partial(\Delta_x f(i,j))}{\partial x} = \frac{\partial(f(i+1,j)-f(i,j))}{\partial x} \\&= \frac{\partial f(i+1,j)}{\partial x} - \frac{\partial f(i,j)}{\partial x} \\&= f(i+2,j) -2f(f+1,j) + f(i,j)\end{split}\nonumber\end{equation}$$ \begin{equation} \begin{split} \frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial{x^2}} &= \frac{\partial(\Delta_x f(i,j))}{\partial x} = \frac{\partial(f(i+1,j)-f(i,j))}{\partial x} \\ &= \frac{\partial f(i+1,j)}{\partial x} - \frac{\partial f(i,j)}{\partial x} \\ &= f(i+2,j) -2f(f+1,j) + f(i,j) \end{split} \nonumber \end{equation}公式编号可以在公式书写时使用\tag{手动编号}添加手动编号，例如： 12345$$\begin{equation}\sum_{i=0}^n F_i \cdot \phi (H, p_i) - \sum_{i=1}^n a_i \cdot ( \tilde{x_i}, \tilde{y_i}) + b_i \cdot ( \tilde{x_i}^2 , \tilde{y_i}^2 ) \tag{1.2.3}\end{equation}$$ \begin{equation} \sum_{i=0}^n F_i \cdot \phi (H, p_i) - \sum_{i=1}^n a_i \cdot ( \tilde{x_i}, \tilde{y_i}) + b_i \cdot ( \tilde{x_i}^2 , \tilde{y_i}^2 ) \tag{1.2.3} \end{equation}12345不加\begin{equation}, \end{equation}也可以，例如：$$\beta^*(D) = \mathop{argmin} \limits_{\beta} \lambda {||\beta||}^2 + \sum_{i=1}^n max(0, 1 - y_i f_{\beta}(x_i)) \tag{我的公式3}$$ \beta^*(D) = \mathop{argmin} \limits_{\beta} \lambda {||\beta||}^2 + \sum_{i=1}^n max(0, 1 - y_i f_{\beta}(x_i)) \tag{我的公式3}行内公式加\tag{}后会自动成为行间公式，例如： 1$z = (p_0, ..... , p_n) \tag{公式21} $ $z = (p_0, ….. , p_n) \tag{公式21} $ 又如： 12$ s = r cos(a+b) = r cos(a) cos(b) - r sin(a) sin(b) \tag{1.1} $$ t = r sin(a+b) = r sin(a) cos(b) - r cos(a) sin(b) \tag{1.2} $ $ s = r cos(a+b) = r cos(a) cos(b) - r sin(a) sin(b) \tag{1.1} $$ t = r sin(a+b) = r sin(a) cos(b) - r cos(a) sin(b) \tag{1.2} $ 参考Automatic Equation Numberinghttp://docs.mathjax.org/en/latest/tex.html#automatic-equation-numbering 将下标放到正下方1、如果是数学符号，那么直接用\limits命令放在正下方，如Max函数下面的取值范围，需要放在Max的正下方。可以如下实现： 1$ \max \limits_{a<x<b}\{f(x)\} $ $ \max \limits_{a<x<b}\{f(x)\} $ 2、若是普通符号，那么要用\mathop先转成数学符号再用\limits，如 1$ \mathop{a}\limits_{i=1} $ $ \mathop{a}\limits_{i=1} $ 矩阵无括号矩阵： 1234567$$\begin{matrix}1 & x & x^2 \\1 & y & y^2 \\1 & z & z^2 \\\end{matrix}$$ \begin{matrix} 1 & x & x^2 \\ 1 & y & y^2 \\ 1 & z & z^2 \\ \end{matrix}矩阵运算： 123456789101112131415161718192021$$\left( \begin{array}{c} s \\ t \end{array}\right)=\left( \begin{array}{cc} cos(b) & -sin(b) \\ sin(b) & cos(b) \end{array}\right)\left( \begin{array}{c} x \\ y \end{array}\right)$$ \left( \begin{array}{c} s \\ t \end{array} \right) = \left( \begin{array}{cc} cos(b) & -sin(b) \\ sin(b) & cos(b) \end{array} \right) \left( \begin{array}{c} x \\ y \end{array} \right)有括号有竖线矩阵： 12345678$$\left[ \begin{array}{cc|c} 1&2&3\\ 4&5&6 \end{array}\right] $$ \left[ \begin{array}{cc|c} 1&2&3\\ 4&5&6 \end{array} \right]行内小矩阵： 1$\bigl( \begin{smallmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{smallmatrix} \bigr)$ 这是一个行内小矩阵$\bigl( \begin{smallmatrix} a & b \ c & d \end{smallmatrix} \bigr)$，直接嵌入行内。

posts.title: markdown语法
posts.text:
[TOC] 测试一下二级标题三级发sadfasfdasdf26515615 sdafsadfasfasfsa fasfsaf dsfsdafsaf 1234567import tensorflow as tfdef fasfasf(): return tf.cast([1,2])if __name__ == "__main__": fasfasf() 本地图片的引用 公式  egin{eqnarray} 
abla\cdot\vec{E} &=&  rac{ho}{\epsilon_0} \ 
abla\cdot\vec{B} &=& 0 \ 
abla	imes\vec{E} &=& - rac{\partial B}{\partial t} \ 
abla	imes\vec{B} &=& \mu_0\left(\vec{J}+\epsilon_0 rac{\partial E}{\partial t} ight) \end{eqnarray} f(n) =  egin{cases}  rac{n}{2}, & 	ext{if } n	ext{ is even} \ 3n+1, & 	ext{if } n	ext{ is odd} \end{cases}SumMarkdown 的理念是，能让文档更容易读、写和随意改。HTML 是一种发布的格式，Markdown 是一种书写的格式。 一般语法强调用两个号包围*ishere 加粗一个*或者_ 就是倾斜_italic_ 三个就dasdasd 用【TOC】生成标题预览 引用 用>就可以了 内引用 超链接图片可以直接拖入，本地一般用相对路径 要调整图片宽高度 ，可以使用<img>标签 链接百度 文件跳转链接专利—打印头 注释用1 1. Somebody that I used to know ↩ 表格 hrerSAsdasd dad 达到、 dasda dsadadsad xasxas下阿是穴 dsfasfdssA cfsa 代码大段落代码输入用3个\123456789```c++#include<stdio>int main(){ int a,b; scanf("%d%d",%a,%b); printf("%d",a+b); return a+b} 行内代码用`包围cfasc 列表有序 firstline second third f bfdgbdf s t f s t 回车几次返回 无序 *按空格 按空格 1321 dasd gg sacas ascxas xcsacx 勾选框- [ ] [ ] ​ 表情 😀 ⏰ 快捷键字体：Ctrl+数字 下划线：Ctrl+U 返回开头：Ctrl+Home 返回结尾：Ctrl+End 生成表格：Ctrl+T 创建链接：Ctrl+K 插入图像：Ctrl+shift+i 不成段落换行：Shift+Enter就是这种形式标准markdown语法中需要[sp][sp]再回车才能实现 math行间公式用\$\$再回车来插入，行内用\$ 包裹$gongshi$ he^{as}=a用mathjax语法 1=312312 a=b^3html ​ ​ Food ​ duanl http://images.google.com/images?num=30&q=larry+bird © AT&T an example A single backtick in a code span: ` xas` Please don’t use any <blink> tags. http://example.com/ 画图1. sequence-diagrams```sequence for example 1234567891011title: exampleparticipant aparticipant bparticipant cnote left of a: a's leftnote right of c: c's rightnote over b: over bnote over b,c: over b and ca-->b: dashed lineb->c: normal linec->>a: open kind arrow 2. Flowchart```flow typora中 无法使用 对流程线及箭头形式的修改 (align-next=no)也用不了 12345678910st=>start: start here:>http://flowchart.js.org/io=>inputoutput: catch dataop=>operation: operation 1sscond1=>condition: judgue heresub1=>subroutine: subroutine 1ed=>end: endst->io->op->cond1cond1(no,right)->sub1(right)->iocond1(yes,bottom)->ed 3. mermaid美人鱼```mermaid 流程图：graph LR 12345graph LRA[Hard edge] -->B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] sequence：sequenceDiagram 1234567891011%% Example of sequence diagram sequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? alt is sick Bob->>Alice: Not so good :( else is well Bob->>Alice: Feeling fresh like a daisy end opt Extra response Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking end 甘特图：gantt 123456789101112131415gantt dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD title Adding GANTT diagram functionality to mermaid section A section Completed task :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active task :active, des2, 2014-01-09, 3d Future task : des3, after des2, 5d Future task2 : des4, after des3, 5d section Critical tasks Completed task in the critical line :crit, done, 2014-01-06,24h Implement parser and jison :crit, done, after des1, 2d Create tests for parser :crit, active, 3d Future task in critical line :crit, 5d Create tests for renderer :2d Add to mermaid :1d 糅合和1.和2.两种形式

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
